alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Palm Beach County through 800 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Canal Point to near Belle Glade Camp. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Beach Gardens, Belle Glade, Pahokee, South Bay, Canal Point, Belle Glade Camp, Lion Country Safari Park, Fremd Village-Padgett Island, The Acreage, Loxahatchee Groves, Loxahatchee NWR and Caloosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
